author: Nidhi Adlakha
title: What mental health experts say
description: Four health professionals on coping with the stress of Covid-19 and resources you can use
content:
Bhairavi Prakash, Founder, Mithra Trust
People are reaching out to us on Instagram for help. We have a highlight reel, Covid19 Tips, to offer resources that we update regularly. Weve also had discussions on several topics, like being productive and learning … [+3264 chars]
